sentence.Network_en: Banks are built to look solid to reassure their customers.
sentence.Network_cn: 银行往往建得看上去很坚固，好让顾客放心。

sentence.Network_en: They tried to reassure her, but she still felt anxious.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们设法让她放心，可她还是焦虑不安。

sentence.Network_en: I tried to reassure her, "Don't worry about it. We won't let it happen again."
sentence.Network_cn: 我试图使她安心，“不要担心。我们不会让它再次发生了。”

在美国战略与国际问题研究中心中国问题专家葛莱仪看来，徐才厚访美将是一次探讨彼此给予“战略性保障（strategic reassurance）” …

entry.tran: 使安心;使得到保证;打消…的疑虑
entry.def: If you reassure someone, you say or do things to make them stop worrying about something.

example.ex: I tried to reassure her, 'Don't worry about it. We won't let it happen again.'...
example.tran: 我试图使她安心，“不要担心。我们不会让它再次发生了。”

example.ex: She just reassured me that everything was fine.
example.tran: 她刚刚让我放心，说一切都好。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to feel sure; give reassurance to;

sentences.sentence: "The airline tried to reassure the customers that the planes were safe"

means.word_mean: 2. give or restore confidence in; cause to feel sure or certain;

sentences.sentence: "I reassured him that we were safe"

auth_sentence.content: Instead, help them find ways to reassure themselves.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead, help them find ways to reassure themselves.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead, help them find ways to reassure themselves.

auth_sentence.content: You think your sister is trying to reassure you.
auth_sentence.res_content: You think your sister is trying to reassure you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You think your sister is trying to reassure you.

auth_sentence.content: Funnily enough, this does not reassure me.
auth_sentence.res_content: Funnily enough, this does not reassure me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Funnily enough, this does not reassure me.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"回,向后,相反,不"; 2. 表示"一再,重新"

stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回,向后,相反,不+son声音+ant……的→声音回过来→回响的
re反+vers转+e→反转的
re一再,重新+splend光辉+ent……的→再光辉→辉煌的
re回,向后,相反,不+neg否认+ade个人或集体→反过来否认原的[党]→背叛者
re回,向后,相反,不+peal驱动→反驱动→取消;参考:appeal呼吁
re不+prob正直+ate人→不正直→败坏
re向后+st站→立于后面者→其他的[人,物]
re一再,重新+cidiv掉下+ism行为,现象→再次掉入罪行
re一再,重新+pose放→再放下[工作]→休息
re一再,重新+surg升起,浪潮+ence表名词→重起浪潮→复兴
re回,向后,相反,不+proach接近→不接近→指责
re反+volt转→反过转→反叛
re回+call喊;想→回想
re回+flect弯曲→弯曲返回→反射
re回,向后,相反,不+linqu离开+ish表动词→离开不再要→放弃
re回,向后,相反,不+mov运动,移动+e→移开,消除
re回,向后,相反,不+pel推→击退
re反+sent感觉→反感→不满
re反+sist站→反着站→反抗
re回+tract拉→拉回,缩回
re回+treat→v.后退,撤退
re一再,重新+arrange安排→v.重新安排
re一再,重新+assure确保→v.消除某人疑虑
re一再,重新+capit头+ulate=ate表动词→重新把头拿出来→概括要点
re一再,重新+claim喊→喊回来→取回,引申为开垦荒地
re一再,重新+commend赞扬→一再赞扬
re一再,重新+furbish装饰→再装饰→刷新
re一再,重新+in入+carn肉+ate表动词→重新进入肉体→产生
re一再,重新+in入+state国家,权力→重新进入权力
re一再,重新+iterate重说→反复重说

stems_affixes.value_cn: 描述,表示,象征;代表;阐明
stems_affixes.word_buile: re一再+present出席的;上演→一再上演,出席的→象征;代表
re一再,重新+produce生产,制造→v. 生殖;再现;繁殖;复制
re一再,重新+verber震动+ate表动词→重新震动→起回声
assure[v.肯定;确保]+ed……的→adj.确实的, 确定的
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
assured[adj.确实的, 确定的]+ly表副词→adv.确实地;确信地
sure肯定,确定→adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确
insure[v.保险,给…保险;保证]+ance表名词→n.保险,保险费,保险业

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念
stems_affixes.word_buile: assure[v.肯定;确保]+ance表名词→n.保证,担保;确信,断言;信心,信念

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证人, 担保, 保证
stems_affixes.word_buile: sure肯定,确定+ty表名词→n.保证人, 担保, 保证
as一再+sure确定→一再确定→肯定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到
stems_affixes.word_buile: en使……+sure[adj.确信的；确实的；一定的 adv.的确]→v.保证, 担保, 使安全, 保证得到 v.确保, 确保, 保证
in使……+sure肯定,确定→v.保险,给…保险;保证
re再次+assure确信→v.消除某人疑虑

Sentence.sentence: Regardless, all these complex measures had the same psychological purpose: to reassure people that the free fall would stop and, thereby, curb the fear that would perpetuate (使持久) a free fall.

means.word_mean: 消除恐惧或疑虑; 恢复信心;使…安心;打消…的疑虑

sentences.en: The doctor reassured the old lady.
sentences.cn: 医生叫那位老妇人放心。

jushi.english: The teacher's calmness during the storm reassured the children.
jushi.chinese: 老师在暴风雨中表现出的镇静安定了学生。

jushi.english: The doctor reassures the sick man.
jushi.chinese: 医生让他的病人消除对健康的疑虑。
